metadata.title: CVE-2016-4806 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Web2py versions 2.14.5 and below was affected by Local File Inclusionvulnerability, which allows a malicious intended user to read/access webserver sensitive files.

criterions.comment: web2py: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
